Table of Contents

Interface IRelativeFileService<T>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Interface with additional methods for handling collection of objects associated with .md files, whose paths are stored as relative to connected main directory path.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IRelativeFileService<T>
Implementations: RelativeFileService<T>, IgnoredFileService, SelectedFileService 

public interface IRelativeFileService<T> : IDirectoryService<T>, ICRUDService<T>, IService<T> where T : IRelativeFile

Type Parameters

T

Type implementing IRelativeFile interface.

Inherited Members
IDirectoryService<T>.UpdatePath(int, string)
ICRUDService<T>.Create(T)

ICRUDService<T>.Delete(T)

IService<T>.ReadById(int)

Methods

FindNewFiles(IEnumerable<FileInfo>, IMainDirectory)

In the list of files connected with specified main directory, finds files, that aren't associated with any element in the stored collection.

List<FileInfo> FindNewFiles(IEnumerable<FileInfo> list, IMainDirectory mainDirectory)

Parameters

list IEnumerable<FileInfo>

The list of files.

mainDirectory IMainDirectory

The main directory for files on the list.

Returns

List<FileInfo>

List of files not associated with any element in the stored collection.

ReadByMainDirId(int)

Gets, from the stored collection of T objects, elements with the specified main directory identifier.

List<T> ReadByMainDirId(int mainDirId)

Parameters

mainDirId int

The searched main directory identifier.

Returns

List<T>

The list of T objects with the specified main directory identifier. If there is no objects with MainDirId equal mainDirId, returned list is empty.
